analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nasaraṇaṁ nahetusampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo hetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: na saraṇam na hetu sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca araṇaḥ hetu sampayuttaḥ dhammo uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. Naaraṇaṁ nahetusampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo hetusampayutto dhammo
analyzed: hetu paccayā na araṇam na hetu sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca saraṇaḥ hetu sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ

original: Hetuyā dve …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṁ …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve.
analyzed: dve pe purejāte āsevane ekam pe vipāke ekam pe avigate dve

original: Nasaraṇaṁ nahetuvippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo hetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: na saraṇam na hetu vippayuttam dhammam paṭicca araṇaḥ hetu vippayuttaḥ dhammo uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. Naaraṇaṁ nahetuvippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo hetuvippayutto dhammo
analyzed: hetu paccayā na araṇam na hetu vippayuttam dhammam paṭicca araṇaḥ hetu vippayuttaḥ dhammo

original: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… sahajāte cattāri …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate cattāri.
analyzed: hetuyā dve ārammaṇe ekam pe sahajāte cattāri pe vipāke ekam pe avigate cattāri
